name: app\src\main\res\layout\fragment_about.xml
content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ScrollView
xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
android:layout_width="match_parent"
android:layout_height="match_parent">

<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
android:layout_width="match_parent"
android:layout_height="wrap_content">

<ImageView
android:id="@+id/appIcon"
android:layout_width="64dp"
android:layout_height="64dp"
android:layout_margin="16dp"
android:contentDescription="@string/app_name"
android:src="@mipmap/ic_launcher"
app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"/>

<TextView
android:id="@+id/appNameVersion"
android:layout_width="0dp"
android:layout_height="wrap_content"
android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
android:layout_marginStart="16dp"
android:textColor="?android:textColorPrimary"
android:textSize="16sp"
app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/appIcon"
app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/appIcon"
tools:text="Transportr 2.0.0"/>

<TextView
android:id="@+id/copyright"
android:layout_width="0dp"
android:layout_height="wrap_content"
android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"
android:layout_marginRight="8dp"
android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
android:text="@string/about_copyright"
app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@+id/appIcon"
app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/appNameVersion"
app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/appNameVersion"/>

<TextView
android:id="@+id/aboutTextView"
android:layout_width="0dp"
android:layout_height="wrap_content"
android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
android:layout_marginStart="16dp"
android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
android:text="@string/about_description"
android:textColor="?android:textColorPrimary"
android:textSize="16sp"
app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/appIcon"/>

<TextView
android:id="@+id/warningTitle"
android:layout_width="wrap_content"
android:layout_height="wrap_content"
android:layout_marginLeft="16dp"
android:layout_marginStart="16dp"
android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
android:text="@string/about_warning_title"
android:textColor="@color/md_red_500"
android:textSize="16sp"
android:textStyle="bold"
app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/aboutTextView"/>

<TextView
android:id="@+id/warningText"
android:layout_width="0dp"
android:layout_height="wrap_content"
android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
android:layout_marginStart="16dp"
android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
android:text="@string/about_warning_text"
android:textColor="@color/md_red_500"
android:textSize="16sp"
app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/warningTitle"/>

<TextView
android:id="@+id/contributions"
android:layout_width="0dp"
android:layout_height="wrap_content"
android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
android:layout_marginStart="16dp"
android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
android:text="@string/about_contributions"
android:textColor="?android:textColorPrimary"
android:textSize="16sp"
app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/warningText"/>

<Button
android:id="@+id/websiteButton"
style="@style/Widget.AppCompat.Button.Colored"
android:layout_width="wrap_content"
android:layout_height="wrap_content"
android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
android:text="@string/about_visit_website"
app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/contributions"/>

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

</ScrollView>

result.harmony_component_code:
Scroll() {
  Column() {
    Image($r('app.media.ic_launcher'))
      .width('64vp')
      .height('64vp')
      .margin({ top: '16vp', bottom: '16vp', start: '16vp', end: '16vp' })
      .objectFit(ImageFit.Contain)
      .alt($r('app.string.app_name'))
      .id('appIcon')
      .alignRules({
        top: { anchor: '__container__', align: VerticalAlign.Top },
        start: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.Start }
      })

    Text($r('app.string.app_name'))
      .width('100%')
      .height('auto')
      .margin({ start: '16vp', end: '16vp' })
      .fontSize('16fp')
      .fontColor(Color.Black)
      .id('appNameVersion')
      .alignRules({
        top: { anchor: 'appIcon', align: VerticalAlign.Top },
        start: { anchor: 'appIcon', align: HorizontalAlign.End },
        end: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.End }
      })

    Text($r('app.string.about_copyright'))
      .width('100%')
      .height('auto')
      .margin({ top: '8vp', end: '8vp' })
      .fontSize('16fp')
      .fontColor(Color.Black)
      .id('copyright')
      .alignRules({
        top: { anchor: 'appNameVersion', align: VerticalAlign.Bottom },
        start: { anchor: 'appNameVersion', align: HorizontalAlign.Start },
        end: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.End },
        bottom: { anchor: 'appIcon', align: VerticalAlign.Bottom }
      })

    Text($r('app.string.about_description'))
      .width('100%')
      .height('auto')
      .margin({ start: '16vp', end: '16vp', top: '16vp' })
      .fontSize('16fp')
      .fontColor(Color.Black)
      .id('aboutTextView')
      .alignRules({
        top: { anchor: 'appIcon', align: VerticalAlign.Bottom },
        start: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.Start },
        end: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.End }
      })

    Text($r('app.string.about_warning_title'))
      .width('auto')
      .height('auto')
      .margin({ start: '16vp', top: '16vp' })
      .fontSize('16fp')
      .fontColor(Color.Red)
      .fontWeight(FontWeight.Bold)
      .id('warningTitle')
      .alignRules({
        top: { anchor: 'aboutTextView', align: VerticalAlign.Bottom },
        start: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.Start }
      })

    Text($r('app.string.about_warning_text'))
      .width('100%')
      .height('auto')
      .margin({ start: '16vp', end: '16vp', top: '8vp' })
      .fontSize('16fp')
      .fontColor(Color.Red)
      .id('warningText')
      .alignRules({
        top: { anchor: 'warningTitle', align: VerticalAlign.Bottom },
        start: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.Start },
        end: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.End }
      })

    Text($r('app.string.about_contributions'))
      .width('100%')
      .height('auto')
      .margin({ start: '16vp', end: '16vp', top: '16vp' })
      .fontSize('16fp')
      .fontColor(Color.Black)
      .id('contributions')
      .alignRules({
        top: { anchor: 'warningText', align: VerticalAlign.Bottom },
        start: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.Start },
        end: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.End }
      })

    Button($r('app.string.about_visit_website'))
      .width('auto')
      .height('auto')
      .margin({ top: '16vp' })
      .id('websiteButton')
      .alignRules({
        top: { anchor: 'contributions', align: VerticalAlign.Bottom },
        start: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.Start },
        end: { anchor: '__container__', align: HorizontalAlign.End }
      })
  }
}

explanation:
1. 使用Scroll组件包裹Column组件，以实现ScrollView的效果。
2. 使用Image组件替换ImageView，并设置width、height、margin、objectFit、alt和id属性。
3. 使用Text组件替换TextView，并设置width、height、margin、fontSize、fontColor和id属性。
4. 使用Button组件替换Button，并设置width、height、margin和id属性。
5. 使用alignRules属性实现ConstraintLayout的约束效果，确保组件在布局中的相对位置与原安卓布局一致。
6. 所有资源引用均使用$r('app.xxx.yyy')格式，确保资源文件已被定义。
